import React, { Component } from 'react' import CartService from '../../../service/cart.service' import './CartList.css' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Table from 'react-bootstrap/Table' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' class CartList extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = {} this.cartService = new CartService() } getCartInfo = () =>{ const userId = this.props.loggedInUser._id this.cartService.getCart(userId) .then(response => this.setState(response.data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } updateProducts = () => { const productsUpdated = [...this.props.cart] productsUpdated.map((elm) => { }) this.setState({productsUpdated}) } componentDidMount = () => { this.getCartInfo() this.updateProducts() } finishProductPost = () => { this.updateProducts() this.getCartInfo() } render() { console.log(this.state) return (

Your Products {this.state.category}

Product Unit Price Quantity Subtotal
Mark Otto @mdo
Keep Buying ) } } export default CartList
